Description:
Instantly Appealing in a Prized Location!
A quiet and tightly held pocket provides family appeal and enticing exclusivity for this memorable modern home on approx. 635sqm land with dual living zones; one configured as a refined lounge, the other defined by a relaxed everyday mood. Surrounded by a central dining space along with a dream size fully equipped kitchen with stone bench tops, huge walk in pantry, dishwasher & 900mm quality s/s appliances.
Four excellent size bedrooms and two bathrooms, including a main bedroom served by walk-in robes and an ensuite, contribute ideal accommodation to a home.
All this located within very close proximity to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, the Craigieburn Junction Home Maker Centre, Aitken Hill Primary School and the serene, green expanses of Craigieburn Golf Course highlights the appeal of the address - and enhances the opportunity for enjoying a fantastic family lifestyle.
Comprising of:
- Grand entrance hallway
- Separate theatre/rumpus room
- Sunroom/entertaining area
- Study
- Double garage with internal access
- Drive through access to the back perfect for caravans and boats
- All of this set on a large corner allotment
- Zoned refrigerated cooling & ducted heating plus much more.
***PHOTO IDENTIFICATION IS REQUIRED FOR ALL INSPECTIONS***
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information, but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
When Quality Matters!!!
Every so often a property comes along that really raises the bar, this is IT! This home is beautifully designed and immaculately finished. Attention to detail and a high level of inclusions are evident throughout - from the attractive streetscape, manicured gardens front and rear to the elegant internal decor this residence offers spacious living on a generous 524m2 corner allotment.
This contemporary home clearly understands the needs of an active family, as illustrated by its practical and functional layout designed with the emphasis on everyday comfort. Situated in the ever-popular Craigieburn's Aston estate. Convenience has never been so affordable with Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, local schools, childcare facilities, medical centres, restaurants, Splash Aqua Park and Leisure Centre, Hume Library, park-lands and transport all nearby.
Features include:
- Three good size bedrooms. Master with full ensuite and walk in robe. Other two bedrooms with built in robes accompanied by the central bathroom and separate WC
- 2 kitchens with quality cabinetry, master kitchen with stone bench-tops with waterfall, splashback, 900mm appliances, walk in pantry. Second kitchen also has stone bench-tops stainless steel appliances and plenty of cupboard space.
- 2 living areas.
- Timber decked alfresco with waterproof roller blinds and inbuilt sitting area.
- Laundry with plenty of cupboard space and stone benchtops.
Extras include:
Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 2 way gas heater, security system, remote controlled double garage with internal and external access, sink stone bench-tops and cabinetry for extra storage, 2 driveways (side driveway access with remote control gate for parking 3 cars or ideal for those truck, boat or trailer owners, landscaped gardens, water fountain, downlights, light fittings window furnishings, laminate timber flooring, 2 dishwashers, garden shed and much more.
Insights: 31 Baronial Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Spectacular Location, Maximum Comfort and Easy Living!
Sahil Kakar & The Eleet Wyndham City are proud to present this beautiful, low maintenance, young and vibrant home in one of the best pockets of Craigieburn. This custom built home is situated in an uncompromising location within midst of schools, shopping centres, general amenities and parklands.
Walking distance to Public Transport, Newbury Primary School, Pelican Childcare, Hume Hockey Club & Eateries on Grand Boulevard. This location is also central to a lot of small home run business's providing you convenience to walk to your desired destination.
This exquisitely maintained home comprises of a fully functional floor plan containing a well appointed kitchen with quality appliances, 3 spacious bedrooms featuring master with en-suite & walk in robe & 2 good size bedrooms with built In robes. Living zone consist of a formal lounge connected to a full blooming backyard and separate meals area.
Overall the residence is equipped with top quality fixtures and fittings throughout and is beautifully presented which guarantees to impress any visitors either investor or first home buyers.
Other top features include:
**Ducted heating,
**Evaporative Cooling,
**Automatic double garage with inside and rear access,
**Stainless steel kitchen appliances,
**Quality floorboards
**Downlight's all through the house
**Well presented floor plan
**Easy connectivity to Mt Ridley Road, Mickleham Road, Craigieburn Road, Hume Freeway & Sydney Road
**22 Mins to Melbourne Airport, 35 Mins to Melbourne CBD
A home to enjoy for many years to come whether its for nesting or investing, don't miss this opportunity as it wont last long!
Inspect it to believe it!
Call Sahil on 0401 926 466 for any further information.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Photo ID is a must.

Description:
A Place To Call Home!
LJ Hooker Craigieburn is proud to present 8 Tuscorora Green Craigieburn. Positioned in a central location with public transport, convenience store, childcare and large parklands only a short stroll away, the convenience and ease of leaving here will be easy to see.
Ideal for first home buyers, downsizers and investors the home has something to offer for everyone.
Step inside and be welcomed with a light filled living and dining area, roomy kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances and plenty of cupboards.
When it comes time to unwind step inside the master bedroom with a walk in robe and semi ensuite with a bath plus two further bedrooms with built in robes.
Continue outside and enjoy the beautiful fruit trees on offer with Figs, Strawberry-Guava, Mandarins, Plums and Kumquat all growing all around the home.
Fantastic extras include front gate, single drive through garage, heating, split system cooling and security shutters. With Craigieburn Central and schools only a short drive away the location speaks for itself.
Make sure you add this to your inspection list as it will be popular amongst many buyers.

Description:
Calling All First Home Buyers & Investors.
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all. Just some of the comforts on hand include master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances over looking the meals and adjoining family room, formal lounge and more. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight surrounded by low maintenance gardens, a double lock up garage with internal access, ducted heating and evaporative cooling makes this the complete package. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates amongst quality homes & parkland, with all the amenities close by including schools, shopping centres, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Townhouse living at its Best
Beautifully styled inside and out, this modern townhouse is a must see for first home buyers, retirees & investors alike. Situated in arguably Craigieburn's best location you'll enjoy the convenience of being within close proximity to Craigieburn Central, parkland with lake, schools, shops & cafes. Its spacious free flowing floor plan comprises of 3 bedrooms, master with walk in robe & ensuite, beautifully appointed kitchen, large family/meals area and main bathroom. Additional features include ducted heating, high ceilings, stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances, double lock up garage and more. You will be the envy of all your friends when you call this one home, call now to inspect as this won't last! Currently Leased out for $1560.00 per calendar month (on a month to month Basis)

Description:
Beautiful 3- Bedroom Family Home in Most Convenient Location
This magnificent 3-bedroom family home has everything you desired for and will win your heart the moment you step in, boasting high ceilings, designed for modern living in family friendly location with all the facilities at the doorsteps. An ideal family home for a first home buyer, downsizers or investors alike.
You will love this brilliant home for
Three sunny bedrooms including king size master suite with full ensuite and walk in robes, two other spacious bedrooms well serviced by spacious central bathroom.
Ultimate location in Craigieburn with all the facilities at its doorsteps such as schools, childcare, health & leisure facilities, public transport & shopping.
Modern kitchen offers plenty of bench & cupboard space and dishwasher.
Ducted heating & split system cooling.
Quality features such as high ceilings maximising the natural light.
Low maintenance front and backyard. Let your kids or pets run in the safety of their own backyard.
Remote operated single car garage.
Walking distance to Mount Ridley primary and secondary school, kindergarten, medical centre, pharmacy, local café and bakeries, parklands and a short stroll to Craigieburn Central shopping, Highland shopping precinct, Hume Anglican Grammar School, Craigieburn Train station and a very easy access to Hume freeway.
An inspection will impress a discerning buyer.
If you are looking for a quality built home in a fantastic location, then your search ends here. Call today.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection

Description:
Family Entertainer with Flair & Flexibility
Tucked away in a blissfully quiet Creekwood Village cul-de-sac, this renovated 4 bedroom home occupies one of the estate's larger blocks (approx 640sqm) providing an impressive
indoor/outdoor lifestyle of quality & versatility.
Immaculate throughout, the home's enhanced interior showcases a master bedroom with fitted
walk-in robe & deluxe private ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with mirrored robes) & equally- stylish main family bathroom.
Dual living zones include a light-filled lounge & adjoining study/home office, along with a
spacious open-plan family/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen complete with
Bosch dishwasher & pyrolytic self-cleaning oven. Other highlights of this remarkable residence include ducted heating & split-system air conditioning, ceiling fans to all bedrooms, alarm system & remote-control security shutters.
Step outside to discover a fabulous al-fresco style all-seasons entertaining area & substantial backyard with additional decking, plus an internally-accessed garage (currently utilized as an additional living area), large double carport & adjoining workshop/storeroom.
Moments from Hanson Road buses, Malcolm Creek trails & acres of parkland, it also offers
easy access to primary & secondary schools, choice of shopping centres, as well as
Craigieburn Station a& the Hume Freeway.
Insights: 8 Crossdale Green, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Family living on a huge 640*m2
Ideally positioned in a family-focused Fairways neighbourhood, this distinctive single-level
residence provides a lifestyle of flair and flexibility on an oversized allotment (approx 20m frontage) complete with additional off-street parking either side of the home.
Taking full advantage of its expansive allotment, the home's free-flowing interior showcases a large master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (2 with built-in robes), main family bathroom & separate WC. Adding to its family credentials is a spacious formal lounge & dining leading through to the open-plan family/meals area & adjoining kitchen with stainless steel appliances, plus the added flexibility of a rear living/TV room.
Along with ducted heating & refrigerated cooling for all-seasons comfort, the home also
includes a ducted vacuum system, 1000L water tank, substantial backyard with large storage shed, internally-accessed double garage (remote-control) with drive-through option, plus the added appeal of gated sideways for secure storage of trailers, boats or work vehicles.
Walking distance to Fairways' renowned parks & local buses (on Fairways Boulevard), it also
offers easy access to the area's popular shopping centres, childcare & kindergarten facilities, as well as a range of primary & secondary schools.
Insights: 9 Tusmore Rise, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Picture-Perfect Low-Maintenance Luxury
A modern oasis of absolute quality & wonderful privacy, this distinctive 3 bedroom residence delivers an environment of easy-living excellence with its versatile floorplan, premium features & gorgeous garden surrounds.
High ceilings throughout, the home's meticulously-detailed interior showcases a large master
bedroom with full-width robes & its own private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (also with
built-in robes) & stylish central bathroom. Adding to its appeal are the spacious open-plan living & dining areas enhanced by a quality kitchen with breakfast bar, tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Other highlights of this remarkable home include ducted heating & split-system air conditioning, additional gas-log fireplace (living area), plantation shutters throughout, solar power, comprehensive CCTV monitoring & motorized security shutters. Double sliding doors reveal a fabulous paved entertaining area complete with pergola & high fences for added privacy, plus established gardens with automated watering system & remote-
control double garage with internal entry.
Walking distance to Cross Keys Reserve, Thorngrove Reserve, Malcolm Creek parkland & endless trails, it's close to public transport & Highlands Shopping Centre, as well as easy
access to Mount Ridley College & Hume Anglican Grammar.

Immaculate Home with a Park facing front!!
Situated in the heart of Craigieburn with the park facing view. Showcasing meticulous presentation, designer-inspired finishes & high-end credentials, this showpiece family residence is simply breath-taking. Astutely designed, maximising space, light & functionality, it features sophisticated entry, expansive open plan family space, dining area & well-appointed kitchen extending onto an all-weather alfresco entertaining deck, set amidst low maintenance landscaped gardens.
Resplendent in top-of-the-range appointments, including high ceilings, 900mm appliances oven, dishwasher, rangehood, walk in pantry & 40mm waterfall stone benchtop the kitchen is truly sublime. There are 4 stunning bedrooms, an opulent master bedroom with walk in robes flaunts custom & impressive en-suite featuring with double vanity, concealed massive shower. 2 other bedrooms with walk in robes and one with built-in-robes, Other Highlights include, ducted-heating and evaporative cooling, alarm, premium floors, powder room, excellent storage & automated double garage/in-home access also have maintenance backyard with alfresco and solar panels for year round energy savings.
Enjoy all the benefits of a lifestyle located opposite sustainable park, close to established local schools; including Hume Anglican Grammar, Newbury Primary, Shopping Centres, Highlands Hotel, Medical Facilities, Hockey Ground, Local shops, Parklands, Childcare facilities, Kinder, Public transport and much more.... Perched up high with its commanding street presence, built with pride and located to absolute perfection, this needs home needs to be on you MUST SEE LIST!
Call Gordon Garg today on 0433 897 397..

Description:
Ease, Elegance And A Designer Edge
We all love luxury, we all want low-maintenance ease the two are combined to bring out the best in each other throughout this scintillating residence enviably positioned immediately adjacent to Mission Hills-Valhalla Reserve. Proximity to schools, Craigieburn Central shopping and bike paths to Highlands Lake further enhance the setting for the distinctive dual level design of a home that impresses the senses from first glance to final detail.
Living areas created to be formal and friendly, refined and relaxed, are framed by high ceilings and elegantly tiled floors while a kitchen of outstanding proportions adds open-plan excellence to everyday dining and special occasion entertaining alike. Three bedrooms and two bathrooms, including the main bedrooms ensuite, provide superlative accommodation to a home where balcony views over the park, heating and cooling, paved alfresco areas and a secure double garage lead an impressive inventory of contemporary attractions. Striking to look at, superb to live in, simple to lease out!
Insights: 49 Mission Hills Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand New Home With Location To Match
This hot property commands attention, and boasts much more than just its location with all amenities at short distance drive and also few choices of schools, Craigieburn Central and other local amenities.
This house comprising 4 great sized bedrooms, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, super-sized meals and separate family area perfect for any kind of family gatherings and functions. Beautiful kitchen, 40mm stone in kitchen, stainless steel appliances, downlights, all timbered flooring in family and meal area. Tiling in laundry and bathrooms, evaporative cooling and ducted heating.
Homes like this does not come up often.
Images For Illustrative Purposes Only
Do not miss out
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Contemporary Creative Family Home!!
Universal Real Estate Vic proudly presents this breathtaking sophisticated contemporary abode, delivering a lifestyle of easy-living excellence with its timeless period-inspired charm. Perfectly positioned in the heart of Craigieburn this family home offers really good size living and outdoor living areas.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 4 Spacious Bedrooms. Massive master bedroom with 2 x large size BIR robes and designer full ensuite with tiles to the ceilings, frameless walk-in shower, flat shower head and inbuilt flush. Other 3 bedrooms serviced by a central bathroom and a study nook in one of the bedrooms.
- CENTRAL BATHROOM: Designer bathroom with porcelain and ceramic tiles, frameless oversized shower and a bathtub.
- KITCHEN: Aesthetic functional kitchen with stainless steel Miele dishwasher, soft close drawers, splashback, electric oven, breakfast benchtop and ample cupboard space.
- LIVING AREAS: Open plan Living/Dining area with front garden views and open fireplace.
- LAUNDRY: Spacious laundry with linen cupboard.
- BACKYARD: Sizeable front yard and backyard. 3 x outdoor decked entertainment areas and stainless-steel wire Balustrade. Immaculate 2 x established gardens surrounded by hedges.
- PARKING: Double garage with remote control access and high ceilings.
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: Roller Shutters, Decking at the front, High Ceilings, LED Downlights, Laminated floorboards throughout the house, Evaporative Cooling, Ducted Heating, Mirror Sliding build in robes, Separate robe for shoes, Grohe taps and Outdoor storage under the deck.
-LOCATION: Walking distance to Mitford Kinder, Football Ground and Craigieburn Primary and Secondary School. Close to Craigieburn Train Station, Our Lady Primary School, Willmott Primary School, Craigieburn Plaza, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Junction, Craigieburn Golf Course, Supermarkets, Gym, Splash Aqua Park, Leisure Centre. Easy access to bus stops, beautiful parklands, Child Care, Service Stations, Restaurants/CafÃ© and Hume Freeway.
Just completed full renovation nothing more to do just move in and enjoy!!
Don't miss out! Call Achal Arora on 432413929 and Jaidev on 466 052 158
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only and all photos are for illustration purposes only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.

Description:
BUILD YOUR DREAM HOME
Located in the popular Mt Aitken estate. This 448m2 allotment has an impressive 14 metre frontage allowing you the freedom to design your dream home and enjoy many wonderful benefits this estate has to offer. Within walking distance to tennis & basketball court, Royalden & Volcano park, walking trails and only minutes away to Craigieburn Central, local schools & childcare facilities, cafes & public transport.
Call Con Tsalkos on 0415 115 557 to secure this superb opportunity to build your dream.
Insights: 5 Glacier Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Family Living with Space & Style!
Located in "Beautiful Mt Aitkin" one of the most sought after pocket in Craigieburn and within proximity to all major amenities. This impressive family home offers space and style with its flowing floor plan with 2.7 high ceiling running throughout featuring modern open plan living including great size kitchen with stone bench tops & walk-in pantry overlooking a large family and meals area with an access to the outdoor entertainment area. 5 generous size bedrooms (2 masters with full ensuites and WIR and all with BIR's), separate study, central bathroom, 4th toilet, spacious laundry, double garage with remote and internal access.
Fixtures and fittings including: ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, visual intercom, alarm system, dishwasher, double blinds, curtains, and much more.
Insights: 24 Banjolina Circuit, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
